mapper.select: SELECT POSITION_ID, NAME, LINE_ID, LINE_NAME, PROCESS_CODE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, light_worktime_rate, light_division_flg, mapping_position_id FROM V_POSITION WHERE DELETE_FLG <> 1 AND POSITION_ID = #{position_id};
SELECT POSITION_ID, NAME, LINE_ID, LINE_NAME, PROCESS_CODE, DELETE_FLG, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM V_POSITION WHERE DELETE_FLG in (0, 2) ORDER BY PROCESS_CODE;
SELECT P.POSITION_ID, P.NAME, P.PROCESS_CODE FROM POSITION P JOIN LINE L ON L.LINE_ID = P.LINE_ID WHERE P.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND L.DELETE_FLG = 0 AND L.INLINE_FLG = 1 ORDER BY P.PROCESS_CODE;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POSITION (NAME, LINE_ID, PROCESS_CODE, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME,light_worktime_rate,light_division_flg,delete_flg) VALUES (#{name}, #{line_id}, #{process_code}, #{updated_by}, current_timestamp,#{light_worktime_rate},#{light_division_flg},#{delete_flg});
mapper.update: UPDATE POSITION SET NAME = #{name}, LINE_ID = #{line_id}, UPDATED_BY = #{updated_by}, UPDATED_TIME = current_timestamp, light_worktime_rate = #{light_worktime_rate}, light_division_flg = #{light_division_flg} WHERE POSITION_ID = #{position_id};
UPDATE POSITION SET DELETE_FLG = 1, UPDATED_BY = #{updated_by}, UPDATED_TIME = current_timestamp WHERE POSITION_ID = #{position_id};
mapper.select: SELECT POSITION_ID FROM POSITION WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND light_division_flg = 1;

SELECT `group_position_id`, `sub_position_id`, `next_position_id`, `control_trigger` FROM `position_group` pg JOIN POSITION p1 on pg.`group_position_id` = p1.position_id JOIN POSITION p2 on pg.`sub_position_id` = p2.position_id WHERE p1.delete_flg = 0 AND p2.delete_flg = 0;

SELECT p1.`position_id`, p1.`mapping_position_id` FROM POSITION p1 JOIN POSITION p2 on p1.`mapping_position_id` = p2.`position_id` WHERE p1.`mapping_position_id` IS NOT NULL AND p1.delete_flg = 0 AND p2.delete_flg <> 1 ORDER BY p1.`mapping_position_id`;
